title: Front-end developer
body: If you are ready to solve really complex problems that perhaps no one else has solved before, have analytical skills, if you are not afraid of large-scale projects and professional challenges-join us!  Алматы, проспект Жибек Жолы, 135           8-747-448-5142

title: Back-end developer
body: Required work experience: 1-3 years; Full-time, full-time; * * Requirements:** At least 2 years of Python development experience, good knowledge of the Django framework, Architecture design skills, Working with PostgreSQL, Docker, Nginx, RabbitMQ, RESTful API design and support, Working with Git (GitLab/Github)

title: Full stack developer
body: Required work experience: 1-3 years, Full-time, Full-time, * * Responsibilities:** Front and Backend of web application development, Optimization and support of existing code, Active interaction with colleagues, discussion of application design and architecture
